snippet.title: SERIAL EXPERIMENTS LAIN - 1998 PS1 Psychological Horror Game (+ Review in the description)
snippet.description:
REVIEW OF "SERIAL EXPERIMENTS LAIN" PS1 GAME:
http://forbidden-siren.ru/index/serial_experiments_lain_ps1_game/0-272
COMPARISON OF "LAIN" GAME and "LAIN" ANIME SERIES:
http://forbidden-siren.ru/index/anime_serial_experiments_lain/0-274

FANMADE PC PORT OF "LAIN" GAME:
http://forbidden-siren.ru/news/serial_experiments_lain_game_english_for_pc/2021-03-29-355

You can read the articles in english through google translate:
https://translate.google.com/translate?hl=en&sl=ru&tl=en&u=http://forbidden-siren.ru/index/serial_experiments_lain_ps1_game/0-272
Google translation is not perfect, but it's perfectly understandable. 

If you are interested in retro horror games, you can also check my other articles here:
http://forbidden-siren.ru/index/silentpyramid_reviews_guides_analysis_articles/0-41
